summary:
Layyla Laa- My second Standalone Mod with 7 Base Body and optional with UNPB Body,ADEC Body and CBBE Body.
I hope you enjoy.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]

[/size][img]https://i.imgur.com/nYoLOe3.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia][color=#8e7cc3][i][size=5]This is Layyla with 7 Base Body and optional with UNPB Body, ADEC Body and CBBE Body.[/size][/i][/color][/font]


[font=Georgia][color=#b4a7d6][i][size=4]This is my second Standalone Mod[/size][/i][/color][/font]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/qZcaHZI.jpg[/img]

[font=Georgia][color=#8e7cc3][size=4][i]Locations:[/i][/size][/color][/font]

[font=Georgia][color=#b4a7d6][size=3][i]Layyla Laa-Ench Class Dremora Melee /Levl.10: You find Layyla in Markarth in the Silver Blood Inn.[/i][/size][/color][/font]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/V1XNfD0.jpg[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/TQkQ95c.jpg[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/ijiBV6D.jpg[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/lWmtQsM.jpg[/img]



[font=Georgia][color=#8e7cc3][size=4][i]Requirements:[/i][/size][/color][/font]

[font=Georgia][color=#b4a7d6][size=3][i]XP32 Maximum Skeleton by xp32[/i][/size][/color][/font]


[font=Georgia][color=#8e7cc3][size=3][i]YOU NEED THIS OR ELSE YOU WILL CRASH TO THE DESKTOP!!![/i][/size][/color][/font]

[font=Georgia][color=#b4a7d6][size=4]Does not replace anything in Game!![/size][/color][/font]


[font=Georgia][color=#8e7cc3][size=3][i]Mods that I use for Layyla:[/i][/size][/color][/font]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?][color=#5ea2e5]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3666//?][color=#5ea2e5]FemFeet by Phygit[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20227/?][color=#5ea2e5]TroubleMakers Clothing UNPB also BBP and BBPx - UNPB Body Main Page by MrTroubleMaker[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992/?][color=#5ea2e5]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity[/color][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888/?][color=#5ea2e5]CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling[/color][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5390/?][color=#5ea2e5]Acdale EyeCandy Body ADEC now TBBP Compatible by AcDale[/color][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28946/?][color=#5ea2e5]Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture - CBBE UNP UNPB ADEC Vanilla by Xs2reality[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/?][color=#5ea2e5]SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800/?][color=#5ea2e5]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27783/?][color=#5ea2e5]HN66s Long Eye Lashes by humannature66[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28740//?][color=#5ea2e5]THEHAGs Privat Tattoos for UNP - UNPB by THEHAG[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34160/?][color=#5ea2e5]Sexy Vanilla Female Armor for UNP and SevenBase with BBP by Crosscrusade[/color][/url]

SG Hairs


[font=Georgia][color=#8e7cc3][size=4][i]Manually Installation:[/i][/size][/color][/font]

[font=Georgia][color=#b4a7d6][size=3][i]Copy the ESP, Meshes and Textures-Folder[/i]
[i]and paste it in your Data- Folder,[/i]
[i]and confirm to overwrite if you already[/i]
[i]have a Meshes and Textures Folder there.[/i][/size][/color][/font]
